name: CONSORTIUM MINORITIES ASSOCATION
briefDescription: The Consortium of Minorities Assocation is charitable, non-profit, secular and non-sectarian, registered Under the Indian Trust Act, Income Tax act and signed up with Planning Commission Government of India Under NGO Partnership System registered voluntary organization, (Registered No. B-KVI-5/2001-2002 Dated 12.4.2001) working in Belgaum district Karnataka State, The Trust is working for the development of Educationally backward classes, SC/ST/Backward Classes minorities / Other Backward Minorities downtrodden and economically weaker section in 2001. Our organization has taken up and executed various activities under the State and Central Government schemes.
